Quick time-to-market

We help businesses build "universal" web apps which allows you to launch your app on various platforms simultaneously from a single codebase.

Cost-effective

Writing one codebase translates to significant savings in the development and maintenance phase, as you only need one development team to cover all platforms.

Performance

We make sure your web pages load fast on all devices regardless of network quality.

SEO

We make sure that your web pages are mobile-friendly and optimized for search engine results ranking.

About

Our motto is same as Quasarâ€™s motto: write code once and simultaneously deploy it as a website, a Mobile App and/or an Electron App. Yes, one codebase for all of them. We will help you develop an app in record time and save you development cost.

This is an ideal for B2B apps and business process automation apps, where you want to get on the market quickly and target multiple operating systems with good enough performance in a cost effective manner.
